block.runology.runicworkbench.notenoughe: The Runic Workbench does not have enough Runic Energy for the recipe you are trying to make!
block.runology.runicworkbench.dontknowho: You do not know how to create the recipe in the Runic Workbench
item.runology.research.previousentryneed: You have not unlocked the previous entries!
item.runology.research.advancementneeded: You do not have the required advancement!
entity.runology.runicoverseer.dialogue1: <Runic Overseer> So... You came to me looking to leave this realm.
entity.runology.runicoverseer.dialogue2: <Runic Overseer> I'm afraid I can't let you leave...
entity.runology.runicoverseer.dialogue3: <Runic Overseer> Every Runologist eventually goes to harnessing instability.
entity.runology.runicoverseer.dialogue4: <Runic Overseer> It's the only way the shattering has made it across all of the realms it has...
entity.runology.runicoverseer.dialogue5: <Runic Overseer> A few realms have a strong natural barrier which allows for it to defend against the shattering, however, all natural barriers eventually fade away...
entity.runology.runicoverseer.dialogue6: <Runic Overseer> I once tried to harness it like you did, and now look at this realm...
entity.runology.runicoverseer.dialogue7: <Runic Overseer> Now, For me to protect the realm you call home, I will destroy you!
entity.runology.runicoverseer.interrupt: <Runic Overseer> I see... You don't care for what I say, Now, I will destroy you!
book.runology.runologyguide.name: Runic Codex
book.runology.runologyguide.basics.name: Basics
book.runology.runologyguide.purity.name: Purity
book.runology.runologyguide.basics.runic: Some things need runic energy for me to create, The runic workbench will allow me to add runic energy to recipes that it will get by consuming runes, It can hold 1000 of each type of runic energy
While these first few things have been easy to figure out, for some other stuff, I will need to use the Runic Analyzer to figure out how to make
book.runology.runologyguide.basics.baser: Fire, Earth, Air, and Water, the 4 base elements of this universe, if I capture them in a rune then I can convert them to runic energy and harness their power
book.runology.runologyguide.artifice.voi: Infusing glass with void runic energy seems to create a material that displays some sort of void similar to what I have noticed with the end portals
book.runology.runologyguide.basics.runet: It seems that given the right circumstances, a rune may transform into a secondary type, I have written all 4 rune transformations and how to cause the transformation I know of at the moment on the following pages
By throwing an Air Rune on the ground in the end, I can transform it into a Void Rune
By striking a Fire Rune with lightning, I can transform it into a Void Rune
By throwing an Earth Rune on the ground and waiting for a plant to grow around it, I can transform it into a Void Rune
By throwing a Water Rune into powdered snow, I can transform it into a Void Rune
book.runology.runologyguide.purity.purit: The 4 base elements, when combined can create true purity, with this purity I can fight against anything impure
Using 1 Purity Powder, I can purify 8 arrows making them able to fight the impure by being shot

If a hole in reality were to ever appear, this will work fine for patching it, It also deals more damage towards impure mobs such as the undead, I have a feeling there may be more impurity in another realm close to mine though...
book.runology.runologyguide.runicmysteri: It seems a shatter has appeared, they appear to be a hole in the fabric of reality, creating a bridge to another realm, however it will need to be stabilized for me to go through

Shatters appear to spread some form of impurity, converting most natural blocks into shatterstone, converting ores into mysterium ore, converting logs into shatterwood and killing leaves, I may be able to get something useful from this...

If I am correct, by creating a gauntlet out of mysterium and empowering it with 8 mysterium cores, I can stabilize a shatter by giving it the power of all 8 mysterium cores, Entering a stabilized shatter is likely a one way trip, I feel an incredible power from the other side, I may need to defeat that incredible power to return to my realm
book.runology.condition.analyze.ln1: Click with paper in your inventory to get research
